thread.title: UMaine senior basketball player suspended indefinitely
thread.title_full: UMaine senior basketball player suspended indefinitely

title: UMaine senior basketball player suspended indefinitely
text:
UMaine senior basketball player suspended indefinitely UMaine senior basketball player suspended indefinitely Post to Facebook UMaine senior basketball player suspended indefinitely UMaine senior basketball player suspended indefinitely   wcsh6.com: http://on.wcsh6.com/1LyzTZL   Join the Conversation To   UMaine senior basketball player suspended indefinitely Johnny Mehler, WLBZ 5:52 p.m. EDT October 16, 2015 University of Maine Black Bears (NCAA Divsion I/America East) (Photo: WLBZ) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
ORONO, Maine 
(NEWS CENTER) -- University of Maine senior basketball player Shaun Lawton may or may not step onto the court for the Black Bears this season due to a failure to meet team standards. 
In a press release, head coach Bob Walsh said, "We have very high standards for our program and they are communicated very clearly to everyone on our team." 
"Unfortunately, Shaun has not lived up to those standards. My hope is that Shaun will learn and grow from this experience," he added. 
Walsh told NEWS CENTER that Lawton's suspension is open-ended, meaning he may or may not play again this year.  //on.wcsh6.com/1LyzTZL TOP VIDEOS
